title: threat data
extract: A threat intelligence feed (TI feed) is an ongoing stream of data related to potential or current threats to an organization's security. ... Such feeds are sometimes said to consist of threat data rather than threat intelligence because the data has not been analyzed and processed, as the term intelligence implies.
extract_html: A threat intelligence feed (TI feed) is an ongoing stream of data related to potential or current threats to an organization's security. ... Such feeds are sometimes said to consist of threat data rather than threat intelligence because the data has not been analyzed and processed, as the term intelligence implies.
